knimeNode.name: PSMCalculateAllFDR
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates the FDR scores for all files.

intro.p: Calculates the FDR scores for all files.

fullDescription.option: Additional Java settings, like giving Java a big enough amount of memory.

ports.inPort: Path to the file, which contains the build pipeline until this step. [xml]
ports.outPort: Path to the file, which will contain the pipeline with added filters. [xml]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of PSMCalculateAllFDR.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of PSMCalculateAllFDR. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
